name: compose-ecs
description: Scripts to build and manage AWS ECS infrastructure

scripts.ecr-login: aws ecr get-login-password --profile notes-app --region us-west-2 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 098106984154.dkr.ecr.us-west-2.amazonaws.com
scripts.repo-svc-userauth: aws ecr create-repository --profile notes-app     --repository-name svc-userauth --image-scanning-configuration scanOnPush=true --region us-west-2
scripts.repo-svc-notes: aws ecr create-repository --profile notes-app     --repository-name svc-notes --image-scanning-configuration scanOnPush=true --region us-west-2
scripts.create-repositories: npm run repo-svc-userauth && npm run repo-svc-notes
